channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Person has been sick, 7th December
item.description:
Person has been sick on pavement

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Leswin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very large pothole, 7th December
item.description:
The pothole has been getting worse and worse over the past 2 months, and is currently at the point where its starting to cause damage to vehicles and suspension systems and tires. It looks like it could turn into a sinkhole, and as it is on a reasonably major road, this would cause significant issues for surrounding properties and residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oldfield Road, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light remain on, 7th December
item.description:
Lewisham high a street outside The police station and Nearest ast Stephens Grove Street light column is day burning. Column is un Numbered

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Lewisham High Street, Hither Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken, 7th December
item.description:
A damaged wooden barrier/rail is located along the edge of the pathway in Kelsey Park. The wood is visibly broken and bent in the middle, with one section partially split. It appears unstable and could pose a tripping or safety hazard to pedestrians. Surrounding area is covered with pine needles, making the obstruction less noticeable. Please assess for repair or removal

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Park Avenue, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Persistent Overflowing bins from empty property
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combedale Road, Greenwich

item.title: Flytipping alley Sternhall lane again, 7th December
item.description:
There’s been rubbish dumped in the alley again. This happens all the time- it’s great that the Council comes and picks it up but we need a long-term solution.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Sternhall Lane, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gully Grates Blocked A2199 steep hill, 7th December
item.description:
Gully grates fully or partially blocked A2199 steep hill between College Road and the Zebra Crossing in the West side of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wide and deep ponding on road, 7th December
item.description:
Wide and deep ponding on road on the Southwark part of Crystal Palace Parade in the filter lane towards A2199 Northbound at the junction. Buses and road users seen swerving to avoid and needing to stray across lanes and avoid drenching pedestrians on the footway. Ponding dangerous for cyclists.as wide and deep forcing them wide into the road. Likely blocked drainage after severe Thames Water mains leak nearby on this road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Spinney Gardens, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders rubble has been dumped here, 7th December
item.description:
Please remove all this builders rubble and rubbish, we won't want it here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, Friary Road, Peckham, Greater London

item.title: Box of items flytipped on Friary Road path way, 7th December
item.description:
Please remove this soon, it's getting in the way of the footpath

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 155, Friary Road, Peckham, Greater London

item.title: Three Blocked Drains outside Toby Carvery, 7th December
item.description:
There are three blocked drains outside the Toby Carvery. One double (nearest the traffic lights) and one single. When it rains it causes huge puddles and it’s a problem for pedestrians and cyclists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crook Log, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Some keeps letting their dog foul right on the corner, 7th December
item.description:
Welcome Park Road and Beaconsfield Road. It’s happening multiple times a week and is a major nuisance and health hazard.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Beaconsfield Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Diverted traffic sign, 7th December
item.description:
This is the sixth time I've reported this. There is a "Diverted Traffic" sign on the pavement at the junction of Terrace Rd and Cassland Rd. It has been there for months. On Nov 13th I received an email from Hackney council saying it would be removed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Terrace Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
